introduction: 12-year-old Riley Ann Taylor recently lost her grandfather, who died right in front of her while teaching her how to play soccer. She soon finds a portal leading to the place people talk about but never see: Heaven. She gains a miraculous healing ability and uses it to help those who are sick but soon gains the diseases these people and animals had. You know what they say, every good thing comes with a price.條目編輯：星夜桐影 tvxqmilk12歲的Riley Ann Taylor最近失去了她的祖父，他在教她踢足球的時就在她面前死去。 她很快就找到了一個通往人們談論但卻永遠不會看到的地方的門戶：天堂。 她獲得了神奇的治療能力，並用它來幫助那些生病的人，但很快就會患上這些人和動物所患的疾病。 你知道他們說什麼，每件好事都要付出代價的。
